articles.description: Vivo has officially announced its first flagship phones of 2020, the X50 series. The key feature is the primary camera’s “gimbal-style” stabilization system.
articles.content:

articles.title: Samsung’s rotating Sero TV goes on sale in the UK - The Verge
articles.description: Samsung’s Sero TV, which rotates between landscape and portrait orientations depending on what kind of content you want to watch, has gone on sale in the UK. Samsung says that the 43-inch TV is available for £1,599.
articles.content:

articles.title: Global smartphone sales plummeted 20% in Q1, thanks to COVID-19 - TechCrunch
